item.title: 2025-08-03 – Blender AI
item.description:
Introduction

I’m exploring ways to model my ideas for a CNC machine.
While searching, I came across this video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x60zHw_z4NM

It introduces an interesting workflow that combines ChatGPT with Blender.

To start experimenting, I want to see if we can model a base frame using 30‑series aluminium profiles.

For additional Blender inspiration, I also found this tutorial:
https://www.rab3d.com/tut_blender.php

Hopefully, the creator will continue to update his progress on this approach.
